description: The post indicates that Windows 11 version 24h2 is exclusively supported on Copilot+ PCs, which utilize Snapdragon hardware. System administrators and users may face difficulties when attempting to upgrade or install this version on non-compatible hardware. This situation could lead to confusion regarding hardware compatibility and costs associated with acquiring new devices to meet the requirements. Without proper hardware, users may be unable to leverage new features or security enhancements offered in this version. Consequently, it's vital for organizations to evaluate their current hardware inventory against the new requirements specified in the relevant KB articles to avoid operational disruptions.
